Sentencas: The performance of the direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell (DC-SOFC) with various solid oxide electrolytes: 8 mol% Y2O3 in ZrO2 (8YSZ), 9 mol% Sc2O3 in ZrO2 (9ScSZ) and 10 mol% Gd2O3 in CeO2 (20GDC) were examined in temperature range 600-880 degrees C.
Titulo: Composite fuel for direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The highest current densities were obtained for DC-SOFC with 20GDC electrolyte.
Titulo: Composite fuel for direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: It was shown that the DC-SOFC performance improved when thickness of the electrolyte was reduced, which can be attributed to the decrease of ohmic polarisation.
Titulo: Composite fuel for direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The performance of DC-SOFC was also improved for a composite fuel consisted of powdered carbon fuel and 8YSZ or 20GDC ionic oxide electrolyte in the amount of ca.
Titulo: Composite fuel for direct carbon fuel cell
Composite fuel for direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: Catalytic effects of Ag and Ni particles addition to the carbon fuel on the DC-SOFC operation were also investigated.
Titulo: Composite fuel for direct carbon fuel cell
